source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a rural scenery shot depicting a weathered, wooden barn with a dark, shingled gambrel roof set against a flat, white, overcast sky. The entire landscape is blanketed in thick snow, with a smaller, attached section of the barn also topped with a layer of white. To the right of the main structure, a rustic wooden corral stands partially visible. The scene is framed by two out-of-focus tree trunks in the foreground—a birch tree on the left and a darker, rough-barked tree on the right—which directs the viewer's gaze toward the barn. There is no single main subject, as the framing and the stark, monochromatic environment create a composition focused on conveying a sense of quiet, cold desolation and the stillness of a winter's day.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt:
The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject. Please concisely specify the type of scenery shot (e.g., a landscape or cityscape scenery shot) in a single fluent paragraph.Also explain why there is no main subject, such as the focus being on the environment, atmosphere, or scale rather than a specific object. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

Please avoid using phrases like "the first frame" or "the last frame" in your description. Instead, refer to the entire sequence simply as "the video." Your description should integrate observations from all frames into a cohesive, temporally and logically consistent narrative, rather than describing frames in isolation. Whenever you mention a subject, be sure to include detailed descriptions of its key visual attributes. The final output should be a single, fluent paragraph describing the video, with no Markdown formatting or introductory text. Don't mention the surroundings or the subject's motion unless necessary to distinguish subjects by location, action, or relationship.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback: 1. 画面中应该有三棵树，左边有两个树干，分别位于一前一后，远离camera的那个分叉的树干比较清晰，靠近camera的那一根树干比较模糊，右侧还有一棵树非常模糊。其余的没什么问题
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: The scene should include three trees. On the left, there are two tree trunks, one in front of the other. The trunk farther from the camera, which is forked, is relatively clear, while the one closer to the camera is more blurred. Additionally, there is another very blurred tree on the right side. Other than this, everything else is fine.

Other than this, everything else is fine.
source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This is a rural scenery shot depicting a weathered, wooden barn with a dark, shingled gambrel roof set against a flat, white, overcast sky. The entire landscape is blanketed in thick snow, with a smaller, attached section of the barn also topped with a layer of white. To the right of the main structure, a rustic wooden corral stands partially visible. The scene is framed by three tree trunks in the foreground. On the left, there are two trunks, one in front of the other; the farther trunk is forked and relatively clear, while the closer one is more blurred. On the right side, there is another very blurred tree. This framing and the stark, monochromatic environment create a composition focused on conveying a sense of quiet, cold desolation and the stillness of a winter's day.

bad_caption: This is a cityscape shot featuring a row of modern glass office buildings with reflective blue windows under a bright, cloudless sky. The foreground is dominated by a busy street filled with yellow taxis and pedestrians in business attire, some carrying briefcases and others holding umbrellas. On the left side, a large digital billboard displays colorful advertisements, while on the right, a line of green-leafed palm trees separates the sidewalk from the road. The scene is lively and bustling, with people crossing at a wide intersection and a cyclist weaving through traffic, capturing the energetic pace of a sunny afternoon in a metropolitan downtown.
